title: 90/403/EEC: Council Decision of 27 July 1990 amending Decision 81/956/EEC on the equivalence of seed potatoes produced in third countries
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 27 July 1990
amending Decision 81/956/EEC on the equivalence of seed potatoes produced in third countries
(90/403/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 of Decision 81/956/EEC '30 June 1990' is hereby replaced by '30 June 1995'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1990.
For the Council
The President
E. RUBBI
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2320/66.
(2) OJ No L 159, 10. 6. 1989, p. 59.
(3) OJ No L 351, 7. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 313, 19. 11. 1988, p. 44.
